data.title: All About Beck | Net Worth, Career, Bio, Age
data.meta_description: From Los Angeles, California, Beck is an acclaimed singer, songwriter, and record producer. Due to his experimental and lo-fi style, as well as his capacity to produce musical compilations that cross numerous genres, Beck became well-known in the early 1990s.
data.text:
From Los Angeles, California, Beck is an acclaimed singer, songwriter, and record producer. Due to his experimental and lo-fi style, as well as his capacity to produce musical compilations that cross numerous genres, Beck became well-known in the early 1990s.

What is the Net Worth of Beck? Salary, Earnings

Over the course of his work, he has accumulated a sizable net worth. His estimated net worth is $20 million.

The musician paid less than $1.3 million for a home in Pasadena in the year 1998.

In 2007, he paid $6.75 million for another house in Hancock Park, Los Angeles. He also bought a Santa Monica house for $2.7 million.

However, barely five months after buying the property, he sold it for $2.9 million. He has undoubtedly lived a wealthy existence.

Where was Beck born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Beck David Campbell was born on July 8, 1970, in Los Angeles, California, in the United States. The musician is fifty years old right now.

He is also an American citizen and has long been a Christian. He is of Norwegian and Jewish ancestry, and his zodiac sign is Cancer.

David Campbell is his father, and Bibbe Hansen is his mother. Channing Campbell, his younger brother, is his name. The musicianâs parents had a difficult time making ends meet since he grew up in a very low-income home.

He had to move in with his paternal grandparents first, then his maternal grandparents in Europe. He was just 10 years old when his parents split.

They were made to live with their mother, along with their brother. He initially obtained his gutÐ°r when he was sixteen years old, at which point he started performing on the streets.

At the high school where he started his education, he was the only other white student there. He also started learning breakdancing at this time and started to like pop.

The musician dropped out of school despite being aware of the value of education because he didnât feel safe there. He next applied to a high school for performing arts but was denied admission.

The musician then started swinging over the Longleaf Alley. He looked through books and antique artifacts in the library.

Even said that in order to remain in class, he had to use a phony D. even developed a friendship with the lecturer there.

How did Beck start his Professional Career?

As a folk musician and street performer, Beck got his start. Till the end of the 1980s, he took a bus to New York City for less than $10.

He then joined the anti-folk movement in New York after that. This gave him the perfect setting to hone his hyper-mundane, surrealist poetic style.

In 1991, he made his way back to Los Angeles since he was friendless and had nowhere to reside.

The performer then returned to being almost unknown in the music industry until he started giving out sample cassettes. BMG Music Publishing, Bong Load Custom Records, and several more companies then started to pay attention.

Due to these inspirations, Hansen worked with Carl Stephenson in 1992, even producing the single âLoserâ as a consequence. The musician thought âLoserâ was ordinary, yet radio stations played it.

Additionally, as time passed, it started to happen more frequently. Hansen agreements were first granted using primary record tags, which sparked a major request war between a number of businesses.

He was finally signed to a deal by Geffen Records that allowed him a lot of creative freedom. Additionally, this contributed to the success of the album âMellow Gold.â Up until 1994, the musician was frequently written off as a trend.

Hansen was motivated to go back into the studio and record âOdelay.â Prior to this, âOdelay,â a 1996 album that blended several genres, was widely praised by critics.

With songs like âWhere Itâs At,â âDevils Haircut,â and âThe New Pollution,â the musicianâs status as a one-hit wonder was destroyed. He even received two Grammy awards for his work on âOdelay.â

In 1988, Hansen released the album âMutationsâ as a follow-up. His second album, âMidnite Vultures,â was then published in 1999. âSea Change,â a sensitive and passionate record, brought forth yet another powerful and fruitful triumph.

He issued âGuero,â which peaked at number two on the charts, in 2005. After âLoser,â his single âE-Proâ went on to become his biggest success. âThe Information,â Husâ tenth album, was released in 2006.

After the publication of his album âModern Guiltâ in 2008, Hansen moved his attention to the development and improvement of his own record label. After years of operating independently, the musician signed Capitol Records in 2013.

Then, in 2014, he put out âMorning Phase,â which ended up winning three Grammys. Before releasing âHyperspaceâ in 2019, the musician published the album âColorsâ in 2017.

Is Beck Married ? Relationship

Beck has been dating fantastic fashion designer Leigh Limon for nine years. The couple, however, called it quits on their romance due to personal reasons.

Itâs believed that the dissolution of their relationship served as inspiration for his 2002 album âSea Change.â In reality, the American musician created nearly all of the songs for the album in a week after parting up with the designer.

The former coupleâs son, Cosimo Henri, was born in 2004. He was formerly married to actress Marissa Ribisi. Marissa and Tuesday, his daughter, were born in 2007. However, the artist filed for divorce from Ribisi on January 15, 2019.

How tall is Beck? Weight, Hair Color

Beck is extremely physically fit, according to his body measurements. He is a decent 5 feet 7 inches (171 cm) tall. The same goes for his physical weight, which is around 64 kg (141 lbs).

The talented American musician has blonde hair and blue eyes. Additionally, he has a slim build and pale skin. He seems to be in terrific health based on his performance because he is often overflowing with energy.

Social Media Details

As a well-known public figure, he has undoubtedly been highly active on social media platforms, but it has been a while since he has utilized his accounts. The American artist has 404 thousand followers on his Instagram account and 330.

3 thousand followers on Twitter. Additionally, he has a Facebook profile with 1.8 million followers. The accomplished musician even manages âBeck,â a YouTube channel, under his own name. As of May 2021, he had 385 thousand subscribers on YouTube.
